title: Current carrying wires attract each other

content.prompt:
Which of the following could be true of wire Y?

I. It carries a current in the same direction as the current in wire X.

II. It experiences a force directed away from wire X.

III. It experiences a force of different magnitude than the force on wire X.

topic.text: 12.3: Magnetic Fields of Current-Carrying Wires and the Biot-Savart Law

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
